meanings.definition: People who study or practice theosophy.
meanings.sent1: The theosophists gathered to discuss their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Many theosophists enjoy exploring spiritual concepts.
meanings.sent3: The theosophists joked that their study group was like a secret society.
meanings.sent4: In the world of spirituality, theosophists are like seekers of hidden truths.
meanings.sent5: Theosophists seek wisdom beyond the material world.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or characteristic of theosophists.
meanings.sent1: Her theosophists necklace was adorned with mystical symbols.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated with theosophists artwork.
meanings.sent3: The theosophists-inspired fashion show was a hit.
meanings.sent4: His eyes had a theosophists glow of inner knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The garden had a theosophists aura of peace and harmony.
